website_summaries.verdict: Vasque created the Grand Traverse to be an all-around hiking shoe. The careful selection of the features did not add bulk to its weight. Hence, it collected positive remarks. Its strongest points include durability, support, and performance. These pros, of course, raises a few items for improvement. Its minimal cushioning and narrow fit left outdoorsmen yearning for more. To conclude, the Vasque Grand Traverse is a low-cut day hiking shoe which may not work well with wide-footed individuals. Nevertheless, its list of benefits still leave prospective buyers enough reasons to check it out.
pros: Heaps of buyers stated that this was their best hiking shoe purchase ever
Despite its low-cut design, the ankle support was impressive, according to a number of testers
Based on a lot of user reviews, the Vasque Grand Traverse performed well on a variety of outdoor conditions
It was a durable pair of day hiking shoes, as testified by numerous hikers
Many owners applauded the grip of this shoe
The Grand Traverse earned praises from a couple of expert reviewers for being lightweight
Umpteen bloggers mentioned how pleased they were with shoe's lacing system
They noted how it enabled them to obtain an overall snug fit
The rubber toe cap of the Grand Traverse gave plenty of users a surprising level of protection against bumps and thumps
Some wearers and an experienced hiker attested to its true-to-size fit
More than a handful of those who tested the shoe noted that it was perfect for day hikes with a light load
An outdoor enthusiast lauded the ventilation the Grand Traverse offered
cons: A handful of users wished there was a waterproof version
The curved shape of the shoe last received disapproval from a few
Some experts thought that there was too little cushioning
The narrow fit of the Grand Traverse did not please a couple of gear reviewers and online purchasers

customer_reviews.title: Really great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really like the color combination. Was using a couple of more “main stream” shoe brands through the last several years and they’ve pretty much gone to grays, blacks, and other dark colors. Shoes are very comfortable and double as a casual everyday shoe. At this point they’ve held up fine so I’ll know about wear and support in about a year but my experience with Vasque was very good from about 15-20 years ago. It helped that amazon price was 30$ less than other internet suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes every day. My only problem with the shoes as they come new is they have a fairly hard sole. I bought a pair of gel insoles sold by the good Dr. and they are very comfortable. I also find the laces stay tied without double knotting. I love that. Like I said, I wear them every day. In the months I've owned them they really haven't shown much wear at all. They are very well made and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I don't care much for either heavy hiking boots or for wearing trail running shoes for long hikes, rugged terrain, or backpacking. These shoes strike the perfect balance. They are light AND sturdy and give me the feeling of solid support while cushioning rocks and rough areas. The Vibram soles are grippy, the shoes look sharp (get lots of compliments),and are a perfect fit for me. I've worn a lot of Vasque shoes over the years so I knew they'd fit great. I order the same size I wear in a Nike running shoe which is a half size larger than my regular shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very odd-shaped shoe.  Try on before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 11.5 us. I ordered 11.5, but they were way too small so I returned them for size 12. Those were also too small in the toe area. It seems that these shoes have a very strange, narrow toe. Now please know that my foot is also on the narrow side, but these shoes have a bizarrely shaped narrow toe. Even with my narrow-ish foot, and a half size up I still couldn't get into this shoe. I would recommend against purchasing this shoe without trying it on first.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great value and shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I wear 10.5D in Made in USA shoes and 11D in import shoes. 11D fits perfect in these. They are light, comfortable and provide good support for a light hiking shoe. Can be worn on modest trails and any urban/office environment. I have worn Danner, Merrell, Salamon.
customer_reviews.author: VBJMGunterFam

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because the toe area is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I would give these shoes 5 stars for looks, quality, ruggedness. But 3 stars because the toe area is too narrow, even for me as I have narrow feet. As a few others commented, the length was great, true to fit, but the narrow toe area for the small toes was too narrow causing my last three smallest toes to hit the front of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit, Good Support
customer_reviews.text: I like Vasque shoes pretty well. After a couple years trying other shoes and becoming almost crippled due to the bad fit of many shoes out there, none cheaper than Vasque I have returned and am well pleased again with the support they offer for my feet. It's been a week in these now, and I'm glad I got them, my sciatica is actually clearing up which I got due to the bad shoes mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Apocalypse Devotee

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love these....but
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is just a little too narrow. I re-laced keeping the toes looser and tried tightening on the ankle side, but it really just isn't comfortable to me. I hoped it would break in and soften up, but after several weeks, it just winds up making my feet/toes hurt. I guess a lucky dude at Goodwill who has skinny toes will be getting a new shoe... sigh
customer_reviews.author: Spockwithalightsaber

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfy, grippy, breathable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: 4 years old and still going strong. Best pair of shoes I've ever owned! I took these to SE Asia plus Nepal for 3 months and they were a great every day shoe as well as great hiker. I did the Annapurna Circuit in Nepal which is over 100 miles in these shoes and was very very happy with them every day. They have great support, incredible grip on rocks and they breath well too! They are coming up on 4 years old and I cant wait to buy another pair! I could see the toe box not being friendly for people with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking, but hiking, not so much
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes for casual wear and going for long walks on level ground. But I found when taking them hiking on a trail that pitched up, down, tilted left & right (like trails tend to do), the outer curve of the toe-box put an inordinate amount of pressure on my outer toes. After a 1.5 mile hike, I couldn't wait to take these shoes off. I have a medium width foot, and only experienced the problem with these shoes. The hiking shoes I replaced them with worked fine, for over 70 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Mr James G McMurry JR

customer_reviews.title: Toe Box Much More Narrow
customer_reviews.text: My second pair purchased just this week. The first pair I've been wearing for nearly 9 months, a men's 13, fit perfect. The second, also a 13, the toe-box felt too narrow and shorter than the other shoe. Comparing the soles, the new shoe and old shoe show ~1/4 inch width difference. In the process of exchanging for a 14 to see if it better accommodates.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Heaston

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed👍🏼 Narrow Toe Box 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoe and sweet looking. Really looking forward to wearing them outside and also on the trails. Comfortable except for the narrow toe box. Little toe felt trapped and cramped it's style against the side of the shoe. Would have loved to keep these but my little toe nearly divorced me and convinced me to return them. If narrow toe boxes don't concern you I'd recommend these in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin A Kent

customer_reviews.title: They also started to squeak very bad and I ended up buying different socks and inserts ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected at first. I took them on a recent trip across Europe and they turned out to be very uncomfortable. The right shoe began to roll over to the right, making them very uncomfortable to wear. They also started to squeak very bad and I ended up buying different socks and inserts while on my trip and nothing solved the problem. I've owned other Vasque shoes before and respect the brand, but never had the problems like I have with the Grand Traverse. I would not recommend purchasing these shoes for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Love the Vasque hikers
customer_reviews.text: Love the Vasque hikers. Have owned 4 pairs. Great in cold and wet Maine. Great in Texas summer heat. They run small. Normally wear 10s but went with 10 1/2 and still a bit snug in the laces.
customer_reviews.author: Dean T. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: but I felt like I needed to with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: So I don't write reviews too often, but I felt like I needed to with these shoes. I cant stop talking about them. They are, hands down, the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. Period. So much so that I purchased a second pair to have when the first eventually wear out. they are nice and snug, no slipping on the foot, and the cushioning is great. I recommend the shoes highly for anywhere that you can wear them. I would wear them all day everyday if I could.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Vasque Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Vasque is my favorite hiking shoe/boot. They fit great for me. They last forever if you exert a bit of effort & take care of them. No negatives in my mind! While I have not had them very long they are comfortable, look good and hopefully will wear like every Vasque shoe/boot that I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: GLM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe for your feet not
customer_reviews.text: they are not true to size unless you minus a toe! Very narrow in the toe area I usually wear a ten wide us so I could not find a wide size so I got a half size bigger but the toe box is cut narrow. Comfortable except my toe!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi-Jo Candreva

customer_reviews.title: Made very well lots of support.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing well made strong shoes. I love them much better then you see out at stores. I love how they lace all the way down to almost the toe. The support is very good. The stitching is very strong. I am enjoying wearing them I feel like a kid again in new shoes. I am ready to buy a second pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I normally get the EE widths in Vasque shoes/boots but this model didn’t have a extra wide option. So yeah, they’re a little barrow for me but I like them nonetheless after a few weeks wearing them in my shop in my feet all day they seem to be relaxing. Sturdy and light. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TMFReaper

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The vibram sole is pretty sold and great grip. The shoe seems very solidly built and great for hiking/approach purposes. I have taken it on a few hikes so far with a bit of scrambling and no problems. Time will tell how the durability stacks up, but from initial impressions, I think they will hold up well. The shoe does run a bit narrow in the toe box as others have mentioned which I would prefer to be a bit wider, but it's not a huge issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rock&Ice

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/stable/durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing the Grand Traverse shoes for three years, buying a new pair every six months as I wear them out. They are my daily shoe and I put a lot of miles on them walking my dog. I've worn them for light hiking, but have other shoes I prefer to wear for big hike days. They are both stable and durable shoes that have eliminated the foot pain I would experience when wearing other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nate C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order these if your second toe is longer than your big toe
customer_reviews.text: If your second toe is longer than your big toe, do not order these. The toe box is not made for this type of foot and the shoe will be uncomfortable. Otherwise, these are excellent shoes. High craftsmanship and very true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: wear at your peril
customer_reviews.text: Ok, unless your feet are very narrow and curved shape, you might want to reconsider. broke these in a bit walking around for a week or two. Went for a 6 mile hike and ended up with Mortons neuroma which I am still dealing with which is PAINFUL! Look at the above view pics of the shoe and ask yourself, "is my foot really this shape?" good looking shoe in dwell made otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Feli

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I went a half size up and was happy with the fit. Very comfortable on the trail. The narrow toe made close right spots a little easier. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: richard vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Seemed Like Nice Shoes but Were Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Odd review because I think I would have liked the shoes but they're just a little too small. I'm sure walking much in them would have been uncomfortable. I'm a solid size 13 and generally any 13 will fit but these were a little small. I'm having to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are duplicates of a pair I bought in a store a year ago. I got this second pair because I was afraid this particular shoe model might be phased out if I waited till my first pair was worn out. They are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned and, in my opinion, they are really good-looking.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good hiking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Used them for about 30 miles of hiking in Switzerland. Good for the money but after one long hike had some foot pain. But good buy for the cost and look great.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable shoes. If they hold up well I will be a repeat buyer. *update* 6 months of abuse later shoes still look and feel great. Ill be ordering a 2nd pair just so ill have a replacement for when they finally do wear out. I highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: lhm

customer_reviews.title: Really like these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, but run a little small. I normally wear a men's 8.5, but had to go up 1/2 size to 9 to have room for my toes. They're light and comfortable, and the soles grip really well. I haven't gone off road with them yet, but they do just fine on the wet and slippery sidewalks and streets here in the Pacific NW.
customer_reviews.author: Bunsen Burner

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical after seeing some of the reviews talking about the shoes being tight in the toe box but took a chance and glad I did. Shoes were a perfect, comfortable fit right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Hopkins Henry

customer_reviews.title: Tough shoe, bery little arch support
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy arch supports. Other than that its a well built shoe. Be careful on smooth wet surfaces as they don't displace the water well
customer_reviews.author: LEFTY

customer_reviews.title: Runs really really really small
customer_reviews.text: Runs really really small!!! Like at least a full size. Very disappointing from a brand I love and trust (ed)
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes for the right feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and wear a 13 or a 14. These shoes fit perfectly but only because I have “Egyptian” shaped toes. If you don’t have the right toe alignment then the toe-box will be too narrow for you. Outside of this, these shoes have been comfortable from the start and feel tank-like sturdy. I hiked in them out of the box without issues. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: Low quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was not sown around the back strap at all. This is the second pair I have returned at this point. Third pair is ordered and we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Sam K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe, great for work
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great quality, very comfortable and light weight. Fits as expected. I had ‘The Rift’ fit previously and this is the best alternative that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! These are so nice and comfortable! Will last me a long time, my Other Vasques I've had for 4 years and haven't even put a dent in them, good quality material!! This shipment was fast! I will be buying from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Maxx Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small so got half size larger. Snug fit. Thick socks won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Vet

customer_reviews.title: These run small
customer_reviews.text: Typically wear a 10 in dress shoes and 10.5 in hiking/athletic. This 10.5 was extremely tight in the toe box and the left shoe was also a little short. Really liked the other features of this shoe but had to return.
customer_reviews.author: jeff hermann

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for hiking or anything outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Took them all over Vietnam and now regularly wear them anytime I'm out in the woods or the mud. I've had them for about a year and they'e held up really well. Once they do start to show some more wear I'll probably buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is way too narrow on the lateral side of the toe box!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is too narrow on the lateral side of the toe box due to the rubber toe not allowing the leather to stretch. The shoe would be awesome otherwise as the footbed, construction and sole are awesome! Don't buy it unless your foot is narrow and you have 2 long toes on the big toe side of your foot and 3 really short toes on the outside of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: E or M Waller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Used for canyoneering in Moab Utah. Worked like a dream. The sole provides awesome traction for slick sandstone traversing. Very durable yet lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Good reputation
customer_reviews.text: This brand came highly recommended by a friend who has been wearing a pair for 7 years(!) If these last even half as long as that it'll be money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Don R. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty rough on my shoes.. 6 months in and these are holding up great. Will buy another in another color. I have a wide foot, wear 11.5, and these fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for bike tour
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for bike tour. I don't like to clip in because I'm a walking tourist as often as I'm cycling. Approach shoes combine sole stiffness where its most needed with a comfortable walking toe, pretty perfect!
customer_reviews.author: P. Daw

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 10.5 but I ordered an 11. Even with the extra 1/2 size the toes were a bit tight initially. But once I gave the laces sone slack and wore them fior a day they loosened up. Sharp looking shoes. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Out the box.
customer_reviews.text: I went up a half size reading other reviews and was not disappointed. Comfortable right out of the box. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small but made well
customer_reviews.text: Consistent with other reviews, these shoes run too small. Hoping replacement pair fit. Dig the look and they are comfy...
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brown

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The back of the heel fixes the heel very badly, which is why it is understated ..
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Derevyanko

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but narrow toebox
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a well made shoe and good for hiking/ light backpacking. The toebox is narrow; the overall length and heel are fine (fit to size) but after a few days hiking the toes were hurting. Good toe protection on the outside, but the flip side is it doesn't expand to accomodate wider feet in the toe area. The sole is fine for a variety of surfaces; I wouldn't use it for a climbing or approach shoe (not really specialized enough for either). The shoe material is pourous so if you are near water at all your sox will be wet pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, order larger size than normal.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5 pairs of shoes, all different brands over Amazon. This is the only size 11 pair that was too small. Other than size I really like these shoes. I will end up buying another pair in 1/2 or maybe even full size larger. I think I would go 5 stars if not for the size issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bret A Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Toe box split open
customer_reviews.text: Style, comfort and fit are all good, but - the front of the toe box split open after a few months of wear. Have had several of the same shoe over the years, and they have lasted longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie T.

customer_reviews.title: great service and product
customer_reviews.text: great service and product. arrived in time and was exactly as advertised. Vasque maintains the same last and sizing for all their products from shoes to boots. A real plus for people like me who have finicky feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Luthy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but a bit tight at the toe. ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, but a bit tight at the toe. But, being that I have a wider foot, I expected it. I use these as my work shoes. I work as a carpenter, and spend much time on my knees during installs and the rubberized toe is bomber!
customer_reviews.author: alias krap master

customer_reviews.title: and they're really comfortable without being ugly (at least IMO)
customer_reviews.text: Just got them, and they're really comfortable without being ugly (at least IMO). Big improvement for me. Definitely go up 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waaaayyyy too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a wide foot and these were way too narrow. They did not fit at all like my Vasque Sundowner boots, which I love. I returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Brown

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair, nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have found Vasque to have a very predictable fit on all of their products, which just so happens to fit me great. I wear these as everyday shoes, lightweight and fairly breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were comfortable right out of the box. I had to get one size larger than I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Marv

customer_reviews.title: ... about 10 hours they are broken in and a joy to wear
customer_reviews.text: After about 10 hours they are broken in and a joy to wear. I do wish the toe box was a bit larger. One foot is slightly larger than the other and a downhill walk can have that foot's toes bumping up against the front of the shoe. Manageable but has to be dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Very beautiful to my taste.
customer_reviews.text: Some claim they are too narrow but, I'd say, they are of regular fit. Not slippery. These may be most breathable of approach shoes -- which doesn't necessarily mean they are most breathable of all shoes.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Left heel support collapsed in a few days
customer_reviews.text: With this collapse I can't wear the L shoe anymore. No problem on right. Oddly, the small toe box issue that others warned about wasn't a problem for me. Vasque used to make one of the best outdoor shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LJR

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-Purpose Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes for all around use. Supportive enough for light hiking yet comfortable enough to lounge around in. Runs a little on the small side. I typically wear 11 and these fit perfect in 11.5. I have a very narrow foot and these seem to work pretty well. I think average width feet would be fine, but wide feet beware?
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I liked color but a little tight for size 8
customer_reviews.author: winiko Patrick Luwanika

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a regular width 10 men's foot, a little on the skinny/bony side, I get these in a 10.5. I have been wearing this exact style of Vasque shoe for the last 4 years, 5 different pairs . I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mc Chesney

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, a little on the small side. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Totally Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, I bought a pair last year, and liked them so much, I reordered another pair for the upcoming season. I like everything about them
customer_reviews.author: slcpete

customer_reviews.title: Shoe lace length
customer_reviews.text: The laces are to short for the shoe. Dumb mistake on Vasque part.
customer_reviews.author: James Mcdonough

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grip on wet rock
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes on the rocks in PA and couldn't have better grip for walking down steep, wet hills in White mountains and Maine
customer_reviews.author: Yak

customer_reviews.title: Still need to break them in.
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out for me. Waiting to see how they break in. Out of the box they are a little stiff. The tongue has a hard edge that hurts the top of my foot and the toe box is a little small for my liking. I re-laced the shoes, skipping the top eyelets and leaving them looser - this made a big difference. Will take them to England next week and see how well they work as 'walking around town' shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W Pelecky

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend for indoor use.
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes look great and are very comfortable, the soles squeak at the heel when you walk. This has gotten progressively worse with time. These shoes are so loud that I can no longer wear them to work or any place that is even remotely quiet. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes look good
customer_reviews.text: Returned. 9.5 was too small and narrow. Shoes look good though and are holding up well after a few months of normal wear couple hours a day. Think shoes run 1/2 size small due to Vibram sole.
customer_reviews.author: Corneliu Apostu

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow at toe
customer_reviews.text: Really well made shoes. Love the look. Very narrow at the toe. I tried full size larger than my normal and the toe was still too narrow. Bummed I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: eRicthefirst

customer_reviews.title: great shoe makes your footing feel confident, take the time to adjust the shoes to your feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great really grippy I was very surprised I used them on a Crosstrek bike and hike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is true and no issues.
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Vasque's. Fit is true and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Clay S. Lowder

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these shoes 5 minutes ago and can already tell I'm going to love them. Very breathable and flexable. Perfect compromise between tennis shoes and hiking boots. My feet are somewhere inbetween an 11 and 11.5. I got 11.5s and they fit like a glove. Overwll id say these run just a tad small.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes worn to Grand canyon and were comfortable on the first wear and getting more and more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too tight in toe area
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to small size. The toe compartment is way tighter than my other pair of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: chris zelvis

customer_reviews.title: ... is my 3rd pair of vasque trail shoes in like 10 years
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of vasque trail shoes in like 10 years. They are some solid shoes and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Schenck Jones

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an 8.5 and it was way to small, more like an 8 or 7.5 and very snug. I've been a solid size 8.5 forever. 9s are always too big. 8s are always too small. The shoe looks great but did not fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. I always wear a 10
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I always wear a 10, but when I order these again, I will get a 10-1/2. These fit but are a bit too snug for anything but the lightest socks. But they are great looking and wear well, and I intend to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I've gone with Vasque, I've been happy about it. These feel great, have good support and are very light. My old shoes were Vasque Juxt. These feel similar, but seem to grip better during wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin in Tarrytown

customer_reviews.title: I've worn these for about a week and I'm pretty unimpressed so far
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these for about a week and I'm pretty unimpressed so far. Kind of a flimsy build and they do NOT breathe. I walked a mile to the park and my feet were on fire. I feel like if there was bett r ventilation it would be a 4 star review. Waste of a hundred bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe - good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe - especially at the price. They are a bit on the tight side - but livable. If I ordered again, I would probably go a half size larger than my norm.
customer_reviews.author: tyeemoon

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: Way more comfortable than I thought! No breaking in time, lightweight, flexible, no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: What a comfortable shoe. I don't usually buy shoes with green laces but, I took a chance and am glad I did. These fit and look sharp. My feet are a little thin, and size 12D fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: D.  Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for urban and light hiking
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoe, its a lower shoe so support is adequate. The bottoms are very grippy. Ventilation is good for hot weather areas. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Dog

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit
customer_reviews.text: Need a size 12.5. 13's were huge and 12's were too tight. Arch wasn't properly aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Morrison

customer_reviews.title: And like the ones before
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Vasque boots and shoes for more than 25 years. And like the ones before , these boots feel and look great. Can't wait to take them out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, durable, fits true, perfect for adventuring. Favorite approach shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe ever. I hope it never changes. Long lasting. Good for everything. Everything all the time right now! I’ll keep buying these as long as they make em
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: He said they are the most comfortable hiking shoes he has very had
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and he absolutely loves them. He said they are the most comfortable hiking shoes he has very had!! Very happy recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all-around daily wear shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great shoes - great soles. I have a pair I have worn frequently (near daily) since last September, and the only thing that has worn out has been a bit of the inside lining by the sole. Everything else still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: @Woodway

customer_reviews.title: I had the same size for a Vasque shoe and they fit fine. Left shoe much smaller than right shoe as
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were too small, despite the correct size. Previously, I had the same size for a Vasque shoe and they fit fine. Left shoe much smaller than right shoe as well
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Holleb

customer_reviews.title: Very good style
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very well made but didn’t fit my feet too tight. Otherwise excellent shoes
customer_reviews.author: cesar almarante

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect. I saw a lot of reviews saying buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I've ha them for only a week. They fit perfect. I saw a lot of reviews saying buy a half size bigger. I bought my normal size and they fit like a glove. I even wore them on a road run for three miles to break them in and haven't had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Madison409

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: to tight in the toe area then try different size still tight
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift and he loves them. They fit perfectly and he said they are the most comfortable footwear he has ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa treadwell

customer_reviews.title: Tight on the  toes.
customer_reviews.text: The right foot's tight on the toes, or maybe it's just me.
customer_reviews.author: bfan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe, I always buy the Vasque. I now wear its every days.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. Good support. Nice looking. Would order again. Also priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Judy from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes to last for years
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes to last for years. My last pair of vasques finally wore out after three years rain, mud, and snow so I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: robtheslob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and great for everyday wear for someone on their feet all day
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S

product_meta.title: Vasque Men's Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: If you can only have one pair, this is the ultimate quiver killer that hikes, scrambles climbs and runs.
feature_bullets: Vibram Ibex with Ideograph and Mega grip Compounds Outsole
